interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EZ Detangler Brush, Morgles 2 Pack Detangling Brush for Curly Hair Ez Hair Detangling Brush for Afro America/ African Hair 3a to 4c Wavy Hair
Review Date: 2021/01/30
Store: MORGLES
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MORGLES', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Wavy,Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '9.69 x 2.99 x 1.38 inches; 6.38 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is my New Favorite Hairbrush! It detangles my Long, Tangled/Knotted hair SO Easily! No more Pulling & Tugging just to make more Knots & cause Damage to my Hair! The Bristles are not Soft/Coated at their Tips, so be Gentle! This Set includes 2 Brush 'Bases' and 2 Support Pieces to put it together - I chose to make just 1 Brush, with both of the Support Pieces. I don't like the extra set of Holes Showing, and the Brush feels Flimsier then I like with just 1 Support Piece.
Review Title: Best Detangling Brush I've Used!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Usage:** Values multi-functional items; prefers products that can serve multiple purposes beyond their intended use, including those tailored for specific hair types or styles.
- **Grooming and Hygiene:** Shows strong interest in personal care tools, emphasizing body scrubbing, cleaning accessories, and hair grooming tools that enhance user experience and ease of use.
- **Quality Expectations:** Prioritizes effectiveness in product functionality and ease of cleaning; appreciates products that deliver on their promises and provide significant user satisfaction, as seen in favorable reviews.
- **User Experience:** Looks for products that offer tangible benefits, such as ease of detangling and minimizing damage, indicating a focus on high performance and practical design.
- **Review Behavior:** Engages positively with innovative solutions that simplify personal care routines, highlighting a preference for practicality and performance in product reviews, and shares constructive feedback to guide others.
- **Gender Neutrality:** Engages with products marketed to all genders, indicating an inclusive approach to personal care, with a keen focus on items that cater to diverse hair types and overall grooming needs.

Overall, the user profile reflects a preference for practical, versatile, and easy-to-maintain personal care products, with a strong emphasis on effective performance, satisfaction, and innovative design in their reviews.
